derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent.: from medieval Latin caudatus, from cauda 'tail'

means.word_mean: 1. a tail-shaped basal ganglion located in a lateral ventricle of the brain
1. having a tail or taillike appendage
2. of a leaf shape; tapering gradually into a long taillike tip
